import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import data from "../data"; function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find( (product) => product._id === props.match.params.id ); return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews}) Reviews
  • {product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Status: {product.staus}
  • Qty:{" "}
); } export default ProductScreen;
